section_1b_loo_cv_v2.freedom_note: 4 params / 5 data points = 0.80 (over-fitting risk: HIGH per auditor directive)
section_1b_loo_cv_v2.constraint_note: P2 fix: A∈(1,200), γ∈(0.001,2), β₀∈(-5,10), δβ∈(-10,10). Degenerate folds flagged by sanity check.

b1_gamma_boundary_analysis.structural_failure_note: B-1 (BLOCKING): 4/5 LOO-CV folds have γ→0 boundary convergence. Exact boundary (γ=0.001): ['DES Y3', 'CFHTLenS', 'HSC Y3'] (3/5). Quasi-boundary (γ < 0.01): ['KiDS-Legacy'] (1/5). Only 1 fold (DLS, γ=0.6195) has an identified γ parameter. In 4/5 folds the model degenerates to R₀ = A × (1+z)^(β₀+δβ ln k) [3-parameter form]. This is the same structural failure class as P-NEW-3 (M0 global fit γ→0+, recorded in Session 3). The LOO-CV is NOT validating a 4-parameter cross-term model in 4/5 folds.

section_1b_loo_cv_v2.mae_description_b1_corrected: LOO-CV MAE = 1.3251σ (all 5 folds) is the MAE of an EFFECTIVELY 3-PARAMETER DEGENERATE MODEL in 4/5 folds. Previous description ('4パラメータ cross-term モデルの LOO-CV MAE = 1.3251σ') is corrected to: '実質3パラメータ縮退モデルの LOO-CV MAE = 1.3251σ (4/5 fold で γ 非識別)'. AIC/BIC漸近正規性はγ境界解では成立しない (P-NEW-3論理と同一)。
section_1b_loo_cv_v2.mae_valid_note: [M-NEW-2 fix] n_valid: 4 → 3. DLS fold sanity_valid overridden to False (β₀_loo=-5.0 boundary). Valid folds: ['DES Y3', 'CFHTLenS', 'HSC Y3']. New MAE (valid only): 0.7689σ.

section_1_aic_bic_v2.note: AIC = 2k + χ²_min, BIC = k×ln(n) + χ²_min (Gaussian likelihood). P3 fix: M0 γ>0 enforced.
section_1_aic_bic_v2.p3_fix_note: P3 fix applied: baseline_cost() now includes 'if A<=0 or gamma<=0: return 1e9'. v1 had gamma_fit=-0.9301 (unphysical).

M0_baseline.model: R₀ = A × k^(-γ) × (1+z)^β_SSoT (2 params, β fixed, γ>0 enforced)

M1_cross_term.model: R₀ = A × k^(-γ) × (1+z)^(β₀+δβ ln k) (4 params, physical constraints)

v1_comparison.note: v1 M0 had γ=-0.9301 (unphysical γ<0). v2 enforces γ>0.

section_p1_kids_zeff_variants.conclusion: KiDS tension with z_eff=0.26 (published): -3.0239σ  [n_valid=3/5] | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.526 (mean n(z)): -2.9240σ  (Δ improvement=+0.0999σ, n_valid=2/5) | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.482 (S8-weighted): -2.9986σ  (Δ improvement=+0.0253σ, n_valid=3/5) | RESULT: Updated z_eff does NOT meaningfully reduce KiDS tension. Reason(s): |Δ|=0.100σ < 0.5σ threshold (KiDS tension reduction is within measurement error); n_valid=2 < 3 (updated z_eff degrades fold validity). Published z_eff=0.26 (lensing-efficiency-weighted) remains the preferred value. KiDS is a structural outlier, not a z_eff miscalibration.

m1_fix.issue: v2 _interpret_kids_variants() triggered 'meaningful' for Δ=0.099σ improvement (< error bar)
m1_fix.old_conclusion: KiDS tension with z_eff=0.26 (published): -3.0239σ | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.526 (mean n(z)): -2.9240σ (Δ=+0.0999σ vs published) | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.482 (S8-weighted): -2.9986σ (Δ=+0.0253σ vs published) | RESULT: Updated z_eff REDUCES KiDS tension. Section 3 trigger was meaningful.
m1_fix.new_conclusion: KiDS tension with z_eff=0.26 (published): -3.0239σ  [n_valid=3/5] | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.526 (mean n(z)): -2.9240σ  (Δ improvement=+0.0999σ, n_valid=2/5) | KiDS tension with z_eff=0.482 (S8-weighted): -2.9986σ  (Δ improvement=+0.0253σ, n_valid=3/5) | RESULT: Updated z_eff does NOT meaningfully reduce KiDS tension. Reason(s): |Δ|=0.100σ < 0.5σ threshold (KiDS tension reduction is within measurement error); n_valid=2 < 3 (updated z_eff degrades fold validity). Published z_eff=0.26 (lensing-efficiency-weighted) remains the preferred value. KiDS is a structural outlier, not a z_eff miscalibration.

m_new1_fix.issue: v3 code computed best_alt_nvalid = max(z526_nvalid=2, z482_nvalid=3) = 3. This is inconsistent with _interpret_kids_variants_v3() which selects best_alt = min([z526, z482], key=|tension|).
m_new1_fix.fix: best_alt = z526_mean_nz (|tension|=2.9240 = min of two variants). best_alt_nvalid = z526_mean_nz.n_valid_folds = 2.

section_1_final_conclusion_b1_confirmed.dual_structural_failure: The v25.0 Section 1 cross-term model exhibits a DUAL structural failure: (A) Over-fitting: 4 params / 5 data points (dof_ratio=0.80); (B) γ non-identifiability: 4/5 LOO-CV folds converge to γ→0 boundary — model reduces to 3-parameter form in 4/5 folds. This dual failure was missed in Sessions 1-3 (only failure A was noted). B-1 fix confirms and deepens the negative result.
section_1_final_conclusion_b1_confirmed.corrected_narrative: v25.0 主要否定的結果（修正版）: v23.0 エンジンの4パラメータ cross-term モデルは、(1) 5データ/4パラメータの過適合、および (2) γ の非識別性（4/5 fold で γ→0 収束、モデルが実質3パラメータに縮退）という二重の構造的失敗により、v24.0 より悪い MAE=1.3251σ を示した。これは v23.0 エンジン刷新（v26.0）の科学的根拠を確立する重要な否定的結果である。
section_1_final_conclusion_b1_confirmed.conclusion_unchanged: Section 1 の最終結論（cross-term モデルの否定的結果）は B-1 修正後も変わらない。B-1 はその失敗の構造的根拠をより正確に記述するものであり、結論を覆すものではない。
